experience.title: Founder
description: Conceptualized and planned the https://pyyre.com platform, outlining key features and strategies.
Oversaw the planning and design phases, collaborating with the team to form plans and user-centric designs.
Initiated and managed the development process, guiding the team through to the delivery of our prototype.
Faced challenges with determination, adapting and pushing forward with resilience.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Evaluated software development project plans and recommended adjustments.
Collaborated with product and engineering team members to define and develop new features.
Instrumented and modified unit and integration tests to improve software quality and reliability.
Implemented and tested enhancement requests to improve functionality and extend performance.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed HTML Emails for marketing email communications.
Interviewed, assisted and trained other developers in the development process.
Maintained the email development environment inside Vignette and Perforce version control.
Worked with campaign owners, QA leads and other technical teams to launch accurate and timely email campaigns.

experience.title: Junior Developer
description: Developed advanced skills in breaking down XML code and templates.
Increased understanding in the importance in time management when managing multiple tasks.
Identified templates that needed revisions and executed appropriate updates.
Analyzed and extended XML schema with the Data Architect and Database Administrator.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Developed a responsive portfolio site using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects and skills.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Built a full-stack app with React, Node.js, and MongoDB for task tracking and team collaboration.

projects.title: API Explorer
projects.description: Developed a tool for testing and exploring REST APIs with React and TypeScript, featuring real-time response visualization.
